has.from sentence: The RNNG with only a stack is the strongest of the ablations , and it even outperforms the " full " RNNG with all three data structures .

stack - only results.from sentence: We remark that the stack - only results are the best published PTB results for both phrasestructure and dependency parsing among supervised models .

stack.from sentence: Ablating the stack gives the worst among the new results .

language modeling.from sentence: A similar performance degradation is seen in language modeling : the stack - only RNNG achieves the best performance , and ablating the stack is most harmful .

syntax.from sentence: Indeed , modeling syntax without explicit composition ( the stackablated RNNG ) provides little benefit over a sequential LSTM language model .
